title: Noxifer

properties.name: description
properties.value: Noxifer is a herb found within the Chambers of Xeric by cleaning a grimy noxifer. It can be grown with a Farming level of 55, by planting noxifer seeds in herb patches found within resource rooms. 60 Herblore is required to clean the grimy herb.

content:
This article is about the cleaned herb. For the grimy herb, see Grimy noxifer.
Noxifer
Released5 January 2017 (Update)

Item ID20902

Noxifer is a herb found within the Chambers of Xeric by cleaning a grimy noxifer. It can be grown with a Farming level of 55, by planting noxifer seeds in herb patches found within resource rooms. 60 Herblore is required to clean the grimy herb.

Unlike other potions, a secondary ingredient must be present in the player's inventory before it can be used on a water-filled gourd vial to create the potions listed below.

[[File:Noxifer detail.png|left|150px]]
'''Noxifer''' is a [[herb]] found within the [[Chambers of Xeric]] by cleaning a [[grimy noxifer]]. It can be grown with a [[Farming]] level of 55, by planting [[noxifer seed]]s in [[herb patch]]es found within resource rooms. 60 [[Herblore]] is required to clean the grimy herb.

Unlike other potions, a secondary ingredient must be present in the player's inventory before it can be used on a [[water-filled gourd vial]] to create the potions listed below.
